title: [愚人节]Minecraft Java版 3D Shareware v1.34 发布
author: SPGoding
txt_content:
本帖最后由 SPGoding 于 2019-4-10 20:25 编辑 
每周快照是Minecraft的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。 适用于正式版的Mod不兼容快照，且大多数Mod都不对每周快照提供支持。
Minecraft 1.14 仍未发布，3D Shareware v1.34 为愚人节特别版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。





MINECRAFT 3D REDISCOVERED 
MINECRAFT 3D 重新发现
25 years later, a masterpiece returns
25 年之后，巨作回归


The basement. A confined, damp space where you abandon all your old belongings to rot for all eternity… or perhaps, a potential gold mine? Yesterday’s trash could actually turn out to be well-aged cheese – a fortune that’s just waiting to be rediscovered. Who knows what you might’ve forgotten down there? Old board games, your favourite childhood toy, perhaps even those grandparents that you haven’t seen in years.地SPGoding下SPGoding室，一个狭SPGoding窄、潮SPGoding湿的地方，在那里有你遗SPGoding弃的所有物SPGoding品，它们正在迎来SPGoding腐SPGoding烂…不过也许，它也会是一个潜SPGoding在的金SPGoding矿？往昔的废SPGoding物在今日变成重SPGoding待人们SPGoding发觉的宝SPGoding藏。谁知道你在那里留下过什么呢？旧的桌游，童SPGoding年最喜欢的玩具，甚至是你几年没有见到SPGoding过SPGoding的SPGoding爷SPGoding爷SPGoding奶SPGoding奶…

When Mojang recently moved offices, we decided to visit our catacombs basement and do a thorough inventory of our old garbage. As we descended into the deepest, darkest corners, we stumbled upon something shocking amongst all the rubble. Something long forgotten. It was Kevin, our old intern we thought had left in 2013 for greater adventures!最近 Mojang 在搬迁办公室，我们决定去原来的地下墓穴地下室看看，处理下那里的旧垃圾。当我们深入最深处、最阴暗的角落时，我们偶然发现了废墟中令人震惊的东西——被遗忘了许久的东西。是 Kevin，我们的老实习生！我们一直以为他在 2013 年离开我们去冒险了呢！

But forget Kevin, again, for we found something far more important down there. We couldn’t believe our eyes. Aboxed copy of the award-winningMinecraft 3D!不过，还是忘了 Kevin 吧。因为我们找到了些比他更重要的东西。我甚至不敢相信自己的眼睛。是获奖作品实体版 Minecraft 3D！

Released on April 1st, 1994, Minecraft 3D was a masterpiece of its all time. A slice of state of the art shareware featuring cutting-edge technology that won everything from GOTY to the Oscar for best supporting actress. But despite universal praise, only a handful of copies were made. In fact, it’s so rare, we can’t even recall ever releasing it. Or developing it. But who cares? It’s back, and its return is bound to change everything!Minecraft 3D 在 1994 年四月一日发布，是当时它那个年代有史以来的史诗巨作，体现着最前沿的科学技术，它赢得了从年度最佳游戏到奥斯卡最佳女主角奖的一切奖项！但尽管有着宇宙级别的褒奖，当时只制作了很少的几套副本，嗯，真的很少，少到我们不记得曾经发布过它，或者开发过它。不过谁关心呢？它回来了，它的回归将会改变一切！

“With the resurgence of Minecraft 3D, we've realized that we use way too many pixels for our graphics,” says Bartosz Bok, developer on the Java Edition. “Our community frequently voices their valid and constructive feedback about game performance. So in future releases, we’re planning to use exactly as many resources as this game looks like it needs. No more, no less. Well, maybe much less.”「随着 Minecraft 3D 的归来，我们意识到现在我们过于重视画面」，Bartosz Bok，Minecraft Java 版开发者指出。「社区经常提出一些关于游戏性能的建设性建议。在未来的版本中，我们计划使用与这款游戏看起来应该需要的资源完全相同的资源，不多不少刚刚好。好吧，可能会少很多。」


MINECRAFT 3D HIGHLIGHTS
MINECRAFT 3D 亮点

Zen-like gameplay, focusing on an absolute state of nothingness. No objectives, no story, no meaning, no fun. Nothing to stress you out!佛系的游戏玩法，专注于绝对的虚无。没有目的，没有故事，没有意义，没有乐趣。没有任何压力！Multi-layered palette with over 10 colours for that realistic feel具有超过 10 种颜色的多层调色板，带来真实体验Beautifully 2D-rendered models, featuring progenitor mobs, such as sheep and cow精美的 2D 模型渲染，彰显祖传生物，如羊和牛Completely written in Turbo Pascal完全使用 Turbo Pascal 编写Burning barrels! Such wow!着火的桶！哇哦！



With this amazing find, the future is finally looking bright for Minecraft. From now on, Mojang will take inspiration solely from 25-year-old games, rather than come up with any new or unique ideas.有了这一美妙的大发现，Minecraft 的未来更加明朗了。从现在开始，Mojang 将只从这经历了 25 年的游戏中吸取灵感，不会再有任何新鲜的创意！

“Programmers of previous epochs have already figured out everything,” explains Bartosz Bok. “This can easily be proven by observing that only old games are good, and nothing worthwhile has been released in the last decade. We are no longer going to muck our code with all those unwanted spatial dimensions.”「上古的程序员已经替我们解答了一切」，Bartosz Bok 解释道。「据目测，只有老游戏才是好的，过去十年里没有发布过任何新的有价值的东西。我们不会再用那些没用的东西糟蹋代码了。」

HOW CAN I PURCHASE THE DIGITAL WONDER THAT IS MINECRAFT 3D?
如何购买这一数字化时代的奇迹——MINECRAFT 3D？

Dearest reader, to withhold art in its purest form would be nothing short of a betrayal of mankind. For this reason, we have decided to release the full experience to the public, so that all seven billion members of humanity can simultaneously celebrate this joyous occasion.亲爱的读者，扣留艺术简直是对人类的背叛，因此，我们决定让公众能够完全体验这一游戏，让 70 亿人类能够共同庆祝这个欢乐的时刻。

That’s why we’ve decided to replace our current Java snapshot with Minecraft 3D. To install Minecraft 3D, open up theMinecraft Java Edition Launcherand enable snapshots in the "Launch Options" tab.这就是我们决定用 Minecraft 3D 替代当前 Java 快照的原因。想要安装 Minecraft 3D，您需要打开 Minecraft Java 版启动器，并在「启动选项」标签页启用快照。

Rejoice! No need to play future updates ever again, when you can simply endlessly relive the glorious days of the past! No longer will we look to the future for answers! We will fully embrace the nineties, become one with the late twentieth century, and seal ourselves in the mollycoddling safety of our comfort zones forever. For today, my friends, we are Minecraft 3D. Yes, Kevin. Even you.当你可以沉浸在往昔的荣耀之中时，再也不用玩后来的版本了！我们不再寻找未来的答案！我们将完全拥抱二十世纪末期的九十年代，永远把自己封存在这舒适区中。朋友们，今天，我们是 Minecraft 3D。 是的，Kevin，你也是。

Enjoy!享受吧！
